English.header_location:
Location - Ukraine, more than 2 years of experience of working in an IT company.
Open minded, patient and delighted with what I do!
English.works_project-pet-desc: Interactive website that serves as a hub for all cat enthusiasts. The project focuses on cats of different breeds and allows users to share their own cat photos as well as vote for their favorite feline representatives.
English.works_project-promt-desc: Promptopia is an open-source AI prompting tool for modern world to discover, create, and share creative prompts.
English.education-html_css: A free of charge HTML and CSS course on YouTube created by Forever Freelancer
English.education-html_description: Description: This course in 2021 introduced me to the concept of "Website Development". The author's interesting approach and the room for implementing my ideas into various design elements of a website laid the foundation for my further development as a Frontend developer.
English.education-html_book_info: Lessons: The whole book was read and its tasks fulfilled
English.education-html_book_description: Description: After completing the course, I still felt uncertain about my own knowledge. To this, I started performing practical tasks after studying the theory from this book. This way, I fully understand what I'm doing.
English.education-html_mdm_lessons: Lessons: Helps me on a daily basis.
English.education-html_mdm_description: Description: I have been using it just to fresh up the knowledge, e.g while I am struggling with a meaning of a certain attribute.
English.education-js_description: Description: After completing the study of HTML and CSS theory, I started reading this book and solving all the practical tasks after each chapter. Within 4 months, I covered all the material. To reinforce the learned theory and keep up with updates, I am now rereading the book for the third time.
English.education-js_first-course-title: JavaScript practical course by Ivan Petrichenko
English.education-js_first-course-descriptions: Description: To reinforce my theoretical knowledge of JavaScript, I enrolled in my first course that focuses on practical application. Throughout the course, we eveloped three projects, and afterwards, I rewrote the code for each of them to solidify my understanding.
English.education-js_second-course-title: Complete JavaScript + React course - from scratch to results by Ivan Petrichenko
English.education-js_second-course-description: Description: After completing the first practical JavaScript course by this author, I also studied the theoretical course. This helped me gain a fresh on the material I had already learned.
English.education-js_codewars-description: Description: Now to enhance my practical skills, I am solving tasks on this platform.
English.education-react-course-description: Description: I started learning React and Redux right away with the author's course. The course helped me quickly understand the purpose of using frameworks, reduced the struggle when reading its documentation later on, and increased the speed of my development process.
English.education-react-documentation-lessons: Lessons: All chapters were read in 15 days.
English.education-react-documentation-descriptio: Description: After completing the course, to solidify the learned material, I worked on a sufficient number of small projects. Then, in order to gain a deeper understanding of the technology, I read through all the. This helped me grasp the workings of the framework at a lower level (I hope a developer is reading this*).
English.education-ts-course-title: Complete course on modern TypeScript by Ivan Petrichenko
English.education-ts-course-descriptions: Description: To enhance my development efficiency, I also studied this language. It helped me reduce the number of errors and the time spent on debugging Additionally, developing in this language seems to assist in maintaining a clear code structure.
English.education-ts-documentation-description: Description: Still awkward to read it. Hope you would agree.
English.education-stuff-title: Another stuff (Chrome extensions, Algoritms, React Native)
English.education-stuff-description: Chrome extensions - My current IT company employer uses a multifunctional web platform that requires a significant amount of time and effort to work with. To optimize my work, I have developed three browser extensions for Google Chrome that have been incredibly helpful.
English.education-stuff-second-description: React Native - I developed only one basic application out of interest. I will continue to learn the technology as needed.
English.education-stuff-alg-description: Algoritms - I have read twice a book Grokking Algorithms by Aditya Bhargava. Does it mean I know smth?)
